anathurak nisa mage thaththawath kalubowila rohalata athulath kara mohothaka ehi waidyawarun wisin thaththage kakula kapa damiya yuthuyayi pawasa thibenawa.namuth eya wyartha wi thibenne aachchi wisin dakwu dadi wirodhaya nisayi.in anathurawa kolambaa jathika rohalata athulath kirimen anathuruwa ehi siti waidyawarun shalyakarmayak kara ema padayata sathekuge asthiyak badda kara thibenawa.thawamath kakule kalawa walata ihalin ema sathkame mahum parawal thibenawa.

hoda wenawa kiyanne kapa kirimak….atham awastha wala hoda wima nisa sathutak athiwenawa thamayi..namuth, apata hoda wima pinisa kapakirim karanna wenawa..samanyeyan edineda jiwithaye api kapa kirimak karanne yamkisi prathilabhayak balaporoththuwen….hoda wima pinisa kapa kirim karanneth me wage prathilabha (pin, dewiyangen waradana, nithiyen berima) balaporoththuwen pamanakmayi kiyala tharka karana ayath innawa…eeth mamanan eekata ekaga wenne na…mamanan dakinne api hoda wiya yuththe ayida kiyana prashnayath api sathutu wiya yuththe ayida kiyana prashnaya wage kiyala

ee mahinda aka්ramikatha manga harima apeksha karanawa.aayathanaye ka්ramawath bawa men ma sewa sapayima pilibanda nishchitha ka්ramawedayakata anukulawa ki්rayakara thibenawa. 2005 di apa mulin ma jathika paladayitha wadasatahanata yomu wune ee anuwa 2006 wasaredi ma jathika paladayitha sammana basnahira palath tharagayen dewana sthanaya himi wuna. 2007 wasare basnahira men ma samastha lanka pa්rathama sthanaya dina ganimatath apata awasthawa uda wuna.mama wisheshayen apage aayathanaya pilibandawa pawathi anduru sithuwama wenas kirimata sithuwe aayathanaye penumath wenas karamin, aayathanaya idiripita diya allak nirmanaya kaleth, pata pata aasana sakas kara, noyek warna thira redi walin alankara kaleth dakina ayage sith pahan kirimatayi.me wanawita idiri wasara dekak sandahath apage aayathanika salasum api sakas kara awasanayi.
karunakarala me kathawa hemotama kiyanna api handak nagamu naththam jathiya winasayi ape sahodariyo winasayi .

hari yakune dan api aapahu wadeta bahimu , mama eeye kiyapu puskola pothata anuwa rawana dehayath ekka sthana kipayaka rawana rajunge miriwadi sagala , pasingal manikyaya wagema rajuta ayithi wela thibuna siyaluma wasthuwa athulath karala thiyena satharamaha nidhanayak ganath liyawila thiyenawa .
ithin kattiya miyo thundena wage sadda nathuwa guti kagena hitiyalu.anthimata gutikama nawathune wewal dekama podi podi kali walata kadila giyata passe.me weddi ape yaluwanta hoda gananlu.
